ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Soulbinders
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, there is a soulbinder in Qeynos. I ve been to her before. She is deep in the city. -Lori bouywunder  wrote: Is there a binder in
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, there is a soulbinder in Qeynos. I've been to her before. She is deep in the city.
 
-Lori


bouywunder <dbacksjp@...> wrote:
Is there a binder in every city? Particularly Qeynos?




--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Chris Talbot" wrote:
> Worked like a charm. Thanks, Matt and Gina.
>
> Chris
>

> > Hi, everyone.

lurking

me. One

I've

activate

> >

>
> target the soulbinder, and /say bind my soul...
>
> Matt
